flavorText:
"While they scramble to fill the sudden vacancy at the top, we strike."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

foreignData.flavorText:
„Während Verwirrung über den Verbleib ihres Anführers herrscht, schlagen wir zu."
—Sedris, König der Verräter
foreignData.name: Führungsvakuum
foreignData.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl bringt alle Kommandeure, die er kontrolliert, aus dem Spiel in die Kommandozone zurück.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Mientras están ocupados intentando llenar la vacante repentina en lo más alto, les atacaremos".
—Sedris, el Rey Traidor
foreignData.name: Vacío de liderazgo
foreignData.text:
El jugador objetivo regresa cada comandante que controla del campo de batalla a la zona de mando.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Tandis qu'ils s'échinent à combler la place soudainement vacante au sommet, nous frappons. »
—Sedris, le Roi traître
foreignData.name: Vacance de direction
foreignData.text:
Le joueur ciblé renvoie dans la zone de commandement depuis le champ de bataille chaque commandant qu'il contrôle.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Mentre loro si affannano a colmare l'improvviso vuoto al vertice, noi colpiamo."
—Sedris, il Re Traditore
foreignData.name: Vuoto di Autorità
foreignData.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio rimette ogni comandante che controlla dal campo di battaglia nella zona di comando.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「突然の空位を埋めようと慌てふためく間に、我々が攻め入る。」
――裏切り者の王、セドリス
foreignData.name: 指導者の欠如
foreignData.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは戦場から自分がコントロールしている各統率者をそれぞれ統率領域に戻す。
カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Enquanto eles correm para preencher o súbito vazio no topo, nós atacamos."
— Sedris, o Rei Traidor
foreignData.name: Vácuo de Liderança
foreignData.text:
O jogador alvo devolve cada comandante que ele controla do campo de batalha para a zona de comando.
Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Пока они грызутся за вдруг освободившееся место на вершине, мы нанесем удар».
— Седрис, король-предатель
foreignData.name: Вакуум Командования
foreignData.text:
Целевой игрок возвращает каждого командира под своим контролем с поля битвы в зону командования.
Возьмите карту.

name: Leadership Vacuum
originalText:
Target player returns each commander they control from the battlefield to the command zone.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Leadership Vacuum targets the player, not their creatures. A commander with hexproof or protection from blue may be returned this way.
You’ll draw a card even if the target player controls no commanders as Leadership Vacuum resolves.

The “commander tax” increases based on how many times a commander was cast from the command zone, not how many times it was put there instead of being put into another zone. The returned commander will cost more to cast again even though it was put directly into the command zone.

text:
Target player returns each commander they control from the battlefield to the command zone.
Draw a card.
